actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

official_title: A bill to require States to permit individuals to register to vote in an election for Federal office on the date of the election.
short_title: Same Day Voter Registration Act of 2002

summary.text: Same Day Voter Registration Act of 2002 - Amends the National Voter Registration Act of 1993 to require States to permit individuals to register to vote in a Federal election on election day.

titles.title: Same Day Voter Registration Act of 2002
A bill to require States to permit individuals to register to vote in an election for Federal office on the date of the election.
